message: Haha, thanks. Just goes to show how much I'm loving this site. I guess my past love of IRC is being rekindled here. It's so awesome that I can suggest something like this and connect with a stakeholder so quickly. Liking this much more than Twitter for this use-case.
Right now nothing is displayed when you hover over the topic name and wait. It'd be nice if it would display the whole topic name in the mouseover text.
Man this is yet another great suggestion, you're a powerhouse!
